description: This file defines a React functional component 'NavLink' that wraps 'react-router-dom's NavLink to add custom class handling and accessibility features such as 'aria-current'. It serves as a layout/navigation element enhancing routing behavior and accessibility.

methods.name: NavLink(props)
methods.description: A functional React component that wraps 'react-router-dom's NavLink to add custom class and aria-current attributes, providing an accessible active link indicator.
